lyrics:
8 contributorslove makes me lyricsintro
yeah yeah yeah

verse 1
i tear the shrink wrap off and put the needle down
fill my bedroom up with a cash song
and crank it up loud
because it makes me feel good
got the pedal pecked hard and the mustang drive
horses screamin at me
momma prayin that ill make it home alive
but it makes me feel good yeah

prechorus 1
like sneakin out late
tellin white lies
stealin one more kiss tonight

chorus
i try my best to behave
and i cant help feelin this way
its not my fault so dont blame me
cause love makes me
and is it some kind of fiction
or the sweetest addiction
so what if im crazy
cause love makes me do it
love makes me do it
yes it does
see hunter hayes liveget tickets as low as 41you might also likeverse 2
well it dont take much
im a sucker for the little things
like the touch on my hand
and the sweet way she leans into me
yeah it makes me feel good
and its an all out buzz how much im into this
no i cant get enough
gotta have more than just one kiss
cause it feels so good

prechorus 2
yeah watchin her sleep
stayin up all night
ridin this heavenly high

chorus
i try my best to behave
and i cant help feelin this way
its not my fault so dont blame me
cause love makes me
and is it some kind of fiction
or the sweetest addiction
so what if im crazy
cause love makes me do it
oh love makes me do it
bridge
i love so hard you think im stupid ha
but its a fight that i dont mind losing

chorus
i try my best to behave
and i cant help feelin this way
its not my fault so dont blame me
cause love makes me
and is it some kind of fiction yeah
or the sweetest addiction
so what if im crazy
cause love makes me do it
i try my best to behave
and i cant help feelin this way love makes me do it
its not my fault so dont blame me mm dont blame me
and is it some kind of fiction
or the sweetest addiction
so what if im crazy no
cause love makes me do it1embed
